title: Transition generation: a third world problem
creator_credit: Alex Von Wetter and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Shows the problems of the first generation of literate young people in Afghanistan, which began a modernisation program in the ‘50’s. Discusses the immensity of the social, emotional and cultural flexibility required of these young people.
